room_title: Escape room "Investigation of a Miss Treedeath " by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: If you are looking for a fun family activity for older teens, their parents and even grandparents this is a great option. Our group of 7 had people ranging in age 16 to 71 and it was great fun for all.

room_title: Escape room "Investigation of a Miss Treedeath " by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: My family and I did the Investigation of Miss Treedeath and solved it with just a little time to spare! The whole experience was so so so fun! Eva was our leader and she was great! I ended it saying "that just made this one of the best days of my life." 10/10 recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Investigation of a Miss Treedeath " by Escape STL in St. Louis
review: My wife and I went alone. This was our first escape room and based on our experience we will definitely do more in the future! I'm not sure how the other locations are in the area but the worker was very nice and helpful. We didn't reserve the room either and he went through the trouble of setting up the room and answering all of our questions to get us in. I'm not sure of his name but he might recognize this, so thank you for being so great!
